knimeNode.name: Database Sorter (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Database Sorter allows to sort rows from a database table.

intro.p: This node is part of the legacy database framework and will be deprecated at the end of 2022. For more information on how to migrate to the new database framework see the migration section of the database documentation.
This node allows rows to be sorted from the input database table. Within the dialog, an SQL ORDER BY clause is interactively created by selecting the columns and sort directions.

fullDescription.option: If you want to extend the sorting criteria to a higher number of columns as displayed, set the number of columns at the bottom and click 'new columns' to add them to the dialog.

ports.inPort: Table in database to apply sorter
ports.outPort: Table in the database with sorted rows
